titleStmt.title: A sermon preached before the Honourable House of Commons at their late monethly fast, being on Wednesday, June 30. 1647. / By Nathaniel Ward Minister of Gods Word.
titleStmt.author: Ward, Nathaniel, 1578-1652.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R.I. for Stephen Bowtell at the signe of the Bible in Popes-head Alley,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
